tools.name: research_request_create
tools.title: Create Research Request
tools.description: Create a new research request on OpenAI, DeepSeek, or another configured reasoning provider.

provider.description: Provider to use (openai, deepseek, ...). Defaults to env or OpenAI.

model.description: Model identifier for the selected provider. Leave blank to auto-select favorites or provider defaults.

query.description: The research question or topic to investigate

system_message.description: Optional system message to guide the research approach

include_code_interpreter.description: Whether to include the code interpreter tool (if supported by the model)

parameters.description: Model-specific parameters validated against the selected model.

tools.name: research_request_check_status
tools.title: Check Research Request Status
tools.description: Check the status of a research request for any provider.

provider.description: Provider to use (openai, deepseek, ...). Defaults to previous provider used for the request.

tools.name: research_request_get_results
tools.title: Get Research Results
tools.description: Retrieve the results of a completed research request for any provider.

provider.description: Provider to use (openai, deepseek, ...). Defaults to previous provider used for the request.

tools.name: reasoning_models_list
tools.title: List Reasoning Models
tools.description: List reasoning/thinking models available across all configured providers.

provider.description: Optional provider filter. Leave blank to list every provider.

tools.name: reasoning_providers_list
tools.title: List Reasoning Providers
tools.description: List configured reasoning providers, credential status, and related environment keys.
